For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877215217. This spacious Vehicle comes with A Balance of 3 YEAR UNLIMITED KM WARRANTY AND SERVICE PLAN. a very ideal vehicle for a family or anybody that enjoys a big body car. A Multifunction steering wheel Built for in city and off road. It has cool features such Bluetooth radio, Android /Apple Carplay, Electronic handbrake. Electronic Brake Distribution(EBD), Anti-lock Braking System(ABS). A rear View camera with PDC for warning of obstructed views. 2 cup holders for the driver and passenger as well as 2 at the back, 2 USB pods to charge your phone while you're on long trips. 

The price excludes dealer fees and 35% LUMAR 100 Micron Smash and Grab Safety Film. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply
